moreBlocks.articles:
• Brooklyn Auto Accidents Lawyers
    We have helped hundreds of individuals and families maximize their recovery after a car, truck or motorcycle accident.
  • Brooklyn Construction Accident Attorneys
    With our extensive experience, knowledge and skill in construction accident claims, we can assist you in your quest to obtain the compensation you and your family deserve.
  • Brooklyn Work Related Accident Lawyers
    Since 1952, our family of personal injury lawyers has been helping families like yours that are affected by accidental injury, including workplace accidents and work-related accidents.
  • Brooklyn Bicycle and Pedestrian Accident Attorneys
    Our experienced attorneys and staff handle all matters related to injuries to pedestrian or bicyclists in collisions with cars, trucks, motorcycles or other motor vehicles.
  • Brooklyn Medical Malpractice Attorneys
    We have a solid track record of helping victims of medical malpractice and their families.

description:
Since 1952, Sackstein Sackstein & Lee, LLP, has been assisting accident victims throughout New York. With offices in Brooklyn, the Bronx, Garden City and Flushing, our law firm can help clients throughout New York City and the state with their personal injury claims.

Our experienced personal injury attorneys handle claims related to car, truck and motorcycle accidents, premises liability (building, sidewalk and stairway accidents), work-related accidents (construction accidents, scaffolding and ladder accidents), medical malpractice and wrongful death. No matter what injuries you have sustained, we will provide you with aggressive representation and unparalleled service.

The foundation of Sackstein Sackstein & Lee, LLP, is treating our clients like family, and we live up to our motto: "Our family helping your family for over 60 years." Our experienced, knowledgeable and confident staff will go the extra mile for you and your case. In fact, we have been successful in obtaining several multimillion-dollar recoveries on behalf of our clients. Additionally, we are well-respected among our peers. Attorney Eric B. Lee was rated AV Preeminent* by Martindale-Hubbell in 2012 and 2013. And attorney Mark H. Sackstein was named for inclusion in the 2013 New York Super Lawyers.

To discuss your personal injury claim in a free initial consultation, contact our law firm today. We are available 24/7 and make home and hospital visits. There is no fee until we recover money for you. Besides English, we speak Korean, Spanish, Chinese and Punjabi.

*AV Preeminent and BV Distinguished are certification marks of Reed Elsevier Properties Inc., used in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the confidential opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell ratings fall into two categories: legal ability and general ethical standards.
